events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position. The resume indicates solid experience in full stack development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate's background includes relevant software engineering and development skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidateâ€™s process to ensure a smooth recruitment experience.
Initial screening call completed with the candidate. They demonstrated strong knowledge of software development processes and relevant technical expertise.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for proceeding with technical interviews.
A technical interview has been successfully scheduled with the engineering team for next Monday to assess coding and system design skills.
